name: crud
description: 1.	Extract the CRUD folder 2.	run npm install on the CRUD folder to install all the node modules and dependecies 3.	download postman to test all the endpoints 		URLS 1. http://localhost:3009/api/user/add           ADDING NEW USER TO THE DATABASE 2.http://localhost:3009/api/users	 GETTING ALL THE USERS FROM THE DATABASE 3.http://localhost:3009/api/user/update/60953efd655aa50e30e02daf		UPDATING A USER FROM THE DATABASE 4.http://localhost:3009/api/employee/60953efd655aa50e30e02daf		DELETING A USER FROM THE DATABASE
